title: Death's Avatar
description: For five years, Elise Kavanagh and James Faulkner have policed relations between Heaven, Hell, and Earth with blood and blade. They're notorious as heroes and killers--the greatest demon hunting team in history. But they're getting tired of fighting.Now a Goddess of Death is driving the world toward destruction. When her doomsday clock reaches twelve, the barriers between Hell and Earth will be ripped away and bring humanity to extinction.The clock just struck nine. The world is running out of time.DEATH'S AVATAR is a gritty urban fantasy novelette featuring flesh-hungry demons, a goddess of death, and lots of violence.
author: S.M. Reine
